description:
Zatch and Kiyo finally have a day to play! Zatch is especially happy because he gets Kiyo all to himself! On the other hand, an over-zealous Zatch is dragging around Kiyo! Eventually the whole gang joins in the fun! Nearing the end of the day, Zatch and K
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle in the Park: Zatch vs. Kiyo!?
公園ファイト! ガッシュVS清麿!?
